column2:
"You were great as always, and that'll be a super useful reference, but there's something I still don't get...
Why can't I see those Mechs' tells?"

"If I learn their attack patterns, I shouldn't have any trouble avoiding them...?
Oh! Yeah, I get what you're sayin'!"
"If I put that advice and your example together, I think I can do it myself! Thanks a bunch!"
